titleStmt.title: Despatch from LG Binger, Governor, to the Under Secretary of State of the Colonies, January 29, 1894

sourceDesc.bibl: Letter from the Governor to the Under Secretary of State of the Colonies Letter from LG Binger, Governor, to the Under Secretary of State of the Colonies January 29, 1894

keywords.term: Under Secretary of State of the Colonies

correspAction.roleName: Under Secretary of State for the Colonies

div1.ab: Le Gouverneur à Monsieur Le Sous-Sécretaire d'Etat des Colonies.
div1.p:
Monsieur le sous-Sécretaire d'Etat,
J'ai l'honneur de vous accuser reception d'un exemplaire du volume "Documents relatifs à la répression de la traite des esclaves, publiés en exécution des art. 82 et suivants de l'Acte Général de Bruxelles de 1892.
J'ai également l'honneur de vous faire parvenir ci-inclus le rapport général pour 1893 sur la mise en vigueur de l'acte général de Bruxelles à la

Je suis avec un profond respect. Monsieur le Sous-Sécretaire d'Etat. Votre très-obeissant Serviteur.
LG Binger

div1.ab: The Governor to Mister Under Secretary of State of the Colonies.
div1.p:
Mister Under Secretary of State,
I have the honor to accuse you with reception of an exemplary of the volume "Documents relative to the repression of the treatment of slaves, published in execution of the art. 82 and following the General Act of Brussels of 1892.
I equally have the honor to send to you enclosed the general report for 1893 appearance in strength of the general act of Brussels to the
div1.ab: MINISTER OF STATE of the COLONIES 1st OFFICE MARCH 5TH 94
div1.p:
I am with a profound respect. Mister Under Secretary of State. Your very obedient server.
LG Binger
